text: "Don't Go Away" is the fourth single off English rock band Oasis' third studio album Be Here Now. The song was released on 19 February 1998. The song was released only as a single in Japan and it peaked at #48 on the Oricon chart. The song was successful in the United States and peaked at #5 on the Billboard Hot Modern Rock Tracks chart in 1997. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1998 songs Category:Oasis (band) songs
title: Don't Go Away
